Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:00.06]I got these fresh eyes, never seen you before like this
[00:05.10]My God, you're beautiful
[00:08.05]It's like the first time
[00:10.68]When we opened the door 'fore we got used to usual
[00:15.26]
[00:17.91]It might seem superficial
[00:21.72]Stereotypical man
[00:25.87]You dress up just a little and I'm like, "Oh, damn"
[00:33.14]
[00:33.24]So suddenly, I'm in love with a stranger
[00:37.35]I can't believe that she's mine
[00:41.35]Now all I see is you with fresh eyes, fresh eyes
[00:48.74]
[01:03.26]Fresh eyes
[01:05.07]Appreciation, well, it comes and it goes
[01:09.23]But I, I'll ride that wave with you
[01:13.14]It's human nature to miss what's under your nose
[01:17.32]'Til you, 'til you remind a fool
[01:20.17]
[01:22.82]Maybe all of this is simple
[01:26.45]My heart's unconditional, yeah
[01:30.93]You dress up just a little and I'm like, "Oh, damn"
[01:38.19]
[01:38.29]So suddenly, I'm in love with a stranger
[01:42.44]I can't believe that she's mine
[01:46.42]Now all I see is you with fresh eyes, fresh eyes
[01:53.58]
[02:08.25]Fresh eyes
[02:10.20]If I could bottle this up, bottle, bottle this up
[02:13.69]I would, I would bottle this up, bottle, bottle this up, I would
[02:18.58]Cause you're gorgeous in this moment
[02:22.42]If I could bottle this up, I would
[02:25.82]
[02:27.22]So suddenly, I'm in love with a stranger
[02:31.18]I can't believe that she's mine
[02:35.19]Now all I see is you with fresh eyes, fresh eyes
[02:42.52]
[02:57.10]Fresh eyes
